title: spack create mirror gives: Traceback with AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute '_concrete' message
body:
When trying to create a spack mirror with the latest develop branch (1/1/17), I get this traceback.

[jeg@localhost]$ spack mirror create -d /home/jeg/spack-mirror -D openspeedshop+cbtf%gcc@4.8.3
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/jeg/spack/bin/spack", line 212, in <module>
    main(sys.argv)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/bin/spack", line 208, in main
    _main(args, unknown)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/bin/spack", line 174, in _main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/mirror.py", line 224, in mirror
    action[args.mirror_command](args)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/mirror.py", line 202, in mirror_create
    directory, specs, num_versions=args.one_version_per_spec)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/mirror.py", line 167, in create
    s.concretize()
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1527, in concretize
    self._expand_virtual_packages(),
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1422, in _expand_virtual_packages
    self_index = ProviderIndex(self.traverse(), restrict=True)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/provider_index.py", line 87, in __init__
    self.update(spec)
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/provider_index.py", line 104, in update
    if spec.satisfies(provider_spec, deps=False):
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 2054, in satisfies
    if not self.variants.satisfies(other.variants, strict=var_strict):
  File "/home/jeg/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 633, in satisfies
    if strict or self.spec._concrete:
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute '_concrete'
[jeg@localhost spack]$
